game.name: Dinostory
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The dinosaurs of 'Potgea' hunt for the meanings of life in this outrageous, story-driven role-playing adventure! Traverse the wilds with species-based field skills, unleash "DINOMIGHT" moves in turn-based battles, and unearth a variety of side-quests and mini-games as you get closer to your goal!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The dinosaurs of 'Potgea' hunt for the meanings of life in this outrageous, story-driven role-playing adventure! Traverse the wilds with species-based field skills, unleash "DINOMIGHT" moves in turn-based battles, and unearth a variety of side-quests and mini-games as you get closer to your goal!
